00021 template <class T>
00022 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00023 template <class T, typename X>
00024 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x);
00025 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00026 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y);
00027 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00028 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z);
00029 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00030 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz);
00031 
00032 #define XNODE_OBJECT  template <class _T> \
00033     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime); \
00034     template <class _T, typename _X> \
00035     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x); \
00036     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y> \
00037     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y); \
00038     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y, typename _Z> \
00039     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y, _Z z); \
00040     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y, typename _Z, typename _ZZ> \
00041     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y, _Z z, _ZZ zz);
00042 
00043 //! XNode supports load/save for scripts/GUI, and signaling among threads.
00044 //! \sa create(), createOrphan()
00045 class XNode : public enable_shared_from_this<XNode>
00046 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00047 , public kame_gc
00048 #endif
00049 {
00050     //! Use XNODE_OBJECT macro in sub-classes.
00051     XNODE_OBJECT
00052 protected:
00053     explicit XNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00054 public:
00055     virtual ~XNode();  
00056 
00057     template <class T>
00058     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00059     template <class T, typename X>
00060     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x);
00061     template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00062     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y);
00063     template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00064     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z);
00065     template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00066     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz);
00067 
00068     //! \return internal/script name. Use latin1 chars.
00069     XString getName() const;
00070     //! \return i18n name for UI.
00071     virtual XString getLabel() const {return getName();}
00072     XString getTypename() const;
00073 
00074     shared_ptr<XNode> getChild(const XString &var) const;
00075     shared_ptr<XNode> getParent() const;
00076 
00077     typedef std::deque<shared_ptr<XNode> > NodeList;
00078     //! \return null if node has no child.
00079     atomic_shared_ptr<const NodeList> children() const {return m_children;}
00080 
00081     void clearChildren();
00082     int releaseChild(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node);
00083 
00084     bool isRunTime() const {return m_flags & FLAG_RUNTIME;}
00085 
00086     //! If true, operation allowed by GUI
00087     //! \sa SetUIEnabled()
00088     bool isUIEnabled() const {return m_flags & FLAG_UI_ENABLED;}
00089     //! Enable/Disable control over GUI
00090     void setUIEnabled(bool v);
00091     //! Disable all operations on this node forever.
00092     void disable();
00093     //! Touch signaling
00094     void touch();
00095 
00096     //! After touching
00097     //! \sa touch()
00098     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > &onTouch() {return m_tlkOnTouch;}
00099     //! If true, operation allowed by GUI
00100     //! \sa setUIEnabled
00101     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > &onUIEnabled() {return m_tlkOnUIEnabled;}
00102 
00103     virtual void insert(const shared_ptr<XNode> &ptr);
00104 protected: 
00105     //! If false, all operations have to be disabled. 
00106     bool isEnabled() const {return m_flags & FLAG_ENABLED;}
00107 
00108     atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> m_children;
00109 
00110     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > m_tlkOnTouch;
00111     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > m_tlkOnUIEnabled;
00112 private:
00113     const XString m_name;
00114     enum {FLAG_RUNTIME = 0x1, FLAG_ENABLED = 0x2, FLAG_UI_ENABLED = 0x4};
00115     int m_flags;
00116 
00117     static XThreadLocal<NodeList> stl_thisCreating;
00118     weak_ptr<XNode> m_parent;
00119 };

00121 //! Base class containing values
00122 class XValueNodeBase : public XNode
00123 {
00124     XNODE_OBJECT
00125 protected:
00126     explicit XValueNodeBase(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00127 public:
00128     //! Get value as a string, which is used as XML meta data.
00129     virtual XString to_str() const = 0;
00130     //! Set value as a string, which is used as XML meta data.
00131     //! throw exception when validator throws.
00132     void str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &);
00133 
00134     typedef void (*Validator)(XString &);
00135     //! validator can throw \a XKameError, if it detects conversion errors.
00136     //! never insert when str() may be called.
00137     void setValidator(Validator);
00138 
00139     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > &beforeValueChanged()
00140     {return m_tlkBeforeValueChanged;}
00141     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > &onValueChanged() 
00142     {return m_tlkOnValueChanged;}
00143 protected:
00144     virtual void _str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &) = 0;
00145 
00146     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > m_tlkBeforeValueChanged;
00147     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > m_tlkOnValueChanged;
00148     Validator m_validator;
00149 };
00150 
00151 class XDoubleNode : public XValueNodeBase
00152 {
00153     XNODE_OBJECT
00154 protected:
00155     explicit XDoubleNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false, const char *format = 0L);
00156 public:
00157     virtual ~XDoubleNode() {}
00158     virtual XString to_str() const;
00159     virtual void value(const double &t);
00160     virtual operator double() const;
00161     const char *format() const;
00162     void setFormat(const char* format);
00163 protected:
00164     virtual void _str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &);
00165 private:
00166     atomic<double> m_var;
00167     XString m_format;
00168     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;
00169 };
00170 
00171 class XStringNode : public XValueNodeBase
00172 {
00173     XNODE_OBJECT
00174 protected:
00175     explicit XStringNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00176 public:
00177     virtual ~XStringNode() {}
00178     virtual XString to_str() const;
00179     virtual operator XString() const;
00180     virtual void value(const XString &t);
00181 protected:
00182     virtual void _str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &);
00183 private:
00184     atomic<XString> m_var;
00185     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;
00186 };

00188 //! Base class for value node.
00189 template <typename T, int base = 10>
00190 class XValueNode : public XValueNodeBase
00191 {
00192     XNODE_OBJECT
00193 protected:
00194     explicit XValueNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false)
00195     : XValueNodeBase(name, runtime), m_var(0) {}
00196 public:
00197     virtual ~XValueNode() {}
00198     virtual operator T() const {return m_var;}
00199     virtual XString to_str() const;
00200     virtual void value(const T &t);
00201 protected:
00202     virtual void _str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &);
00203     atomic<T> m_var;
00204     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;
00205 private:
00206 };
00207 
00208 typedef XValueNode<int> XIntNode;
00209 typedef XValueNode<unsigned int> XUIntNode;
00210 typedef XValueNode<bool> XBoolNode;
00211 typedef XValueNode<unsigned int, 16> XHexNode;
00212 
00213 template <class T>
00214 shared_ptr<T>
00215 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime)
00216 {
00217     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime));
00218     insert(ptr);
00219     return ptr;
00220 }
00221 template <class T, typename X>
00222 shared_ptr<T>
00223 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x)
00224 {
00225     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x));
00226     insert(ptr);
00227     return ptr;
00228 }
00229 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00230 shared_ptr<T>
00231 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y)
00232 {
00233     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y));
00234     insert(ptr);
00235     return ptr;
00236 }
00237 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00238 shared_ptr<T>
00239 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z)
00240 {
00241     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y, z));
00242     insert(ptr);
00243     return ptr;
00244 }
00245 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00246 shared_ptr<T>
00247 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz)
00248 {
00249     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y, z, zz));
00250     insert(ptr);
00251     return ptr;
00252 }
00253 
00254 template <class T>
00255 shared_ptr<T>
00256 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime)
00257 {
00258     new T(name, runtime);
00259     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00260     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00261     return ptr;
00262 }
00263 template <class T, typename X>
00264 shared_ptr<T>
00265 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x)
00266 {
00267     new T(name, runtime, x);
00268     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00269     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00270     return ptr;
00271 }
00272 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00273 shared_ptr<T>
00274 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y)
00275 {
00276     new T(name, runtime, x, y);
00277     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00278     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00279     return ptr;
00280 }
00281 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00282 shared_ptr<T>
00283 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z)
00284 {
00285     new T(name, runtime, x, y, z);
00286     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00287     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00288     return ptr;
00289 }
00290 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00291 shared_ptr<T>
00292 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz)
00293 {
00294     new T(name, runtime, x, y, z, zz);
00295     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00296     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00297     return ptr;
00298 }
